languages.text: {n}Проктор сжимает зубы до скрежета.{/n} "Не путайте судилище Чорда с Лекс Империалис. Закон Бога-Императора остается совершенен, как бы ни ошибались судьи".

{n}The Proctor clenches his teeth with an audible screech.{/n} "Do not equate Chorda's preposterous court with the Lex Imperialis. The God-Emperor's Law remains perfect, even if the judge has erred beyond all hope."
languages.original_text: {n}Проктор сжимает зубы до скрежета.{/n} "Не путайте судилище Чорда с Лекс Империалис. Закон Бога-Императора остается совершенен, как бы ни ошибались судьи".

languages.text: {n}索罗蒙咬紧了牙关，牙齿发出了刺耳的声音。{/n}“不要把库尔达荒谬的恶行与帝国法典画等号。即便仲裁官犯下了令人不齿的大错，神皇的法律也依然完美无缺。”
languages.original_text: {n}The Proctor clenches his teeth with an audible screech.{/n} "Do not equate Chorda's preposterous court with the Lex Imperialis. The God-Emperor's Law remains perfect, even if the judge has erred beyond all hope."

traits.locale_text: {n}索罗蒙咬紧了牙关，牙齿发出了刺耳的声音。{/n}“不要把库尔达荒谬的恶行与帝国法典画等号。即便仲裁官犯下了令人不齿的大错，神皇的法律也依然完美无缺。”

languages.text: {n}El Procurador rechina los dientes de forma sonora.{/n} «No compare el absurdo tribunal de Chorda con la Lex Imperialis. La ley del Dios Emperador sigue siendo perfecta, aunque la jueza haya descarriado más allá de toda esperanza».
languages.original_text: {n}The Proctor clenches his teeth with an audible screech.{/n} "Do not equate Chorda's preposterous court with the Lex Imperialis. The God-Emperor's Law remains perfect, even if the judge has erred beyond all hope."

traits.locale_text: {n}El Procurador rechina los dientes de forma sonora.{/n} «No compare el absurdo tribunal de Chorda con la Lex Imperialis. La ley del Dios Emperador sigue siendo perfecta, aunque la jueza haya descarriado más allá de toda esperanza».

languages.text: {n}Le proctor serre si fort la mâchoire que vous entendez ses dents grincer.{/n} « Ne comparez pas la cour ridicule de Chorda à la Lex Imperialis. La loi de l'Empereur-Dieu reste parfaite, même quand un juge s'égare au-delà de toute réparation. »
languages.original_text: {n}The Proctor clenches his teeth with an audible screech.{/n} "Do not equate Chorda's preposterous court with the Lex Imperialis. The God-Emperor's Law remains perfect, even if the judge has erred beyond all hope."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le proctor serre si fort la mâchoire que vous entendez ses dents grincer.{/n} « Ne comparez pas la cour ridicule de Chorda à la Lex Imperialis. La loi de l'Empereur-Dieu reste parfaite, même quand un juge s'égare au-delà de toute réparation. »

languages.text: {n}代理人は音を立てて歯ぎしりをした。{/n}「チョーダの馬鹿げた法廷をレックス・インペリアと同一視するな。たとえ裁く者が救いようもないほど間違っていようと、神帝陛下の法は常に完全なのだから」
languages.original_text: {n}The Proctor clenches his teeth with an audible screech.{/n} "Do not equate Chorda's preposterous court with the Lex Imperialis. The God-Emperor's Law remains perfect, even if the judge has erred beyond all hope."

traits.locale_text: {n}代理人は音を立てて歯ぎしりをした。{/n}「チョーダの馬鹿げた法廷をレックス・インペリアと同一視するな。たとえ裁く者が救いようもないほど間違っていようと、神帝陛下の法は常に完全なのだから」

languages.text: {n}Üsteğmen, duyulur bir gıcırtıyla dişlerini sıkıyor.{/n} "Chorda'nın saçma mahkemesini Lex İmperialis ile bir tutma. Yargıç umutsuzca yanılmış olsa bile Tanrı İmparator'un Kanunu mükemmel kalır."
languages.original_text: {n}The Proctor clenches his teeth with an audible screech.{/n} "Do not equate Chorda's preposterous court with the Lex Imperialis. The God-Emperor's Law remains perfect, even if the judge has erred beyond all hope."

traits.locale_text: {n}Üsteğmen duyulur bir gıcırtıyla dişlerini sıkıyor.{/n} "Chorda'nın saçma mahkemesini Lex Imperialis ile bir tutma. Yargıç umutsuzca yanılmış olsa bile Tanrı İmparator'un Kanunu mükemmel kalır."

languages.text: {n}Der Proktor knirscht hörbar mit den Zähnen.{/n} "Stellt Chordas absonderliches Gericht nicht mit dem Lex Imperia gleich. Das Gesetz des Gottimperators bleibt perfekt, selbst wenn der Richter sich hoffnungslos geirrt hat."
languages.original_text: {n}The Proctor clenches his teeth with an audible screech.{/n} "Do not equate Chorda's preposterous court with the Lex Imperialis. The God-Emperor's Law remains perfect, even if the judge has erred beyond all hope."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Proktor knirscht hörbar mit den Zähnen.{/n} "Stellt Chordas absonderliches Gericht nicht mit dem Lex Imperia gleich. Das Gesetz des Gottimperators bleibt perfekt, selbst wenn der Richter sich hoffnungslos geirrt hat."
